name: maniyatech/magento2-mage-ai
description: MageAI is a smart, AI-powered content generation extension for Magento 2 that helps merchants create compelling product descriptions, short descriptions, and SEO metadata (meta title, keywords, meta description) in just a few clicks. Designed to save time and boost your storeâ€™s visibility, MageAI integrates directly into the product admin panel, allowing you to generate high-converting content tailored to your products, brand tone, and SEO goals.
